mdRecord.dcterms:description: Statement of admiration for John Marshall, and responses. Reference to Ralph Sampson. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
I LOVE John Marshall | Yep, a great chief justice | I LOVE YOUR MOTHER | John's a pussy. | He was too chicken to [illegible] | I you love him so much go to JMU | RALPH! | Who?
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Marshall, John, 1755-1835
Sampson, Ralph, 1960-
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
